name: Strongest Leveling
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Comedy,Martial Arts,Adventure,Isekai,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: Nothing is impossible with the system in my hands! I want the most beautiful woman! I want to be the most powerful person! I want to have the noblest of statuses! I aim to conquer everything under the sky!

name: Dovahlove Special Edition (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Moefied dragons from Skyrim.
Pixiv link: https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/70458357

name: Musuko no Ore e no Taido ga Kihonteki ni Hidoi no de Manga ni Shite Mimashita.
Konna Ore wo Suki Toka Majika
nutshell: Even though cafe owner Mugimaru is good looking, rumors say he's a playboy. But that doesn't stop the pessimistic, anti-social, and overly serious salaryman, Roku, from going there, since he likes how the owner makes his coffee. However, one day, the drunk Mugimaru pushes Roku down and says, "Since you like my cafe, that means you like me too, right?" What will happen between salaryman Roku and the psychopathic owner, Mugi?!

name: Boku no Mama chan (43) Kaihatsu Nikki
nutshell: Маэда Мамору и его младший коллега Ширасу Кристофер – главные герои супер-популярного сериала о двух мужчинах, отношения которых явно выходят за рамки рабочих и дружеских. Между актерами тоже не всё так просто. Ширасу тайно влюблён в своего старшего коллегу. Он пристает к нему, оправдываясь тем фактом, что зрительницам нужно больше фансервиса. И когда Ширасу заставляет Маэду прочитать фанфик о них двоих, тот осознает, что больше не может работать рядом с Ширасу…

name: Yamada-ke no Onna
nutshell: A high school girl raised in a family of women. Her grandmother is divorced 3 times, her mom 2 times. That's why she wants to marry a strong & reliable man. One day she accidentally hits her delinquent-like classmate with her bicycle. (MANGA MOGURA RE)

name: REDO
nutshell: What started for Nozomi as a simple walk home from school with her friend turned into an absolute nightmare. It repeats over and over again. Is this all a dream? Will she be able to escape? A Pixiv oneshot by SeNMU.

name: Ai ni Kidzuke yo
nutshell: Yoshihara has again bumped into Hoshina, his high school kouhai. Once, when they were both drunk, Yoshihara slept with Hoshina. Since that time, Yoshihara realized that he loved Hoshina, but unable to tell Hoshina his true feelings and unable to withstand the pain of a superficial relationship, Yoshihara distanced himself from him.

name: Nidome no Yakusoku
nutshell: Jun was Hayato's servant and childhood friend, but it came to an abrupt end when Jun decided to go to a different school. Now, in high school, they've been reunited. Jun must now figure out what he means to Hayato after all these years.

name: Demon in Mount Hua
nutshell:
The Murim’s public enemy, the Slaughterer Demon Monarch, Yeom Se-Ak! It’s been a hundred years since he was trapped in Mount Hua after being captured by the Sword God, Han Ho.
He waited all these years for his chance to seek revenge…
The long period of time caused this incident to be forgotten by the world, and eventually, even the Yeom Se-Ak was forgotten.
But.
“Sir, what is your name…?”
A coincidental meeting, and the name of an archenemy that he said unwittingly, “H-Han Ho.”
At the end of a vain journey, an unexpected path branches out. The ultimate demon that’s in Mount Hua, Yeom Se-Ak’s choice!

name: Phoenix Nirvana
nutshell:
In her first life, she loved him but he left her for another. She died and was reborn, but even so she still loved him and he made her lose everything. Second rebirth, all she wants is to stay away from him…
Official Animated Version: Ake Animation on YouTube
Official Subtitled Version: S1 | S2 | S3

name: Macross Δ - White Knight of the Black Wing
nutshell: The year is Year 2058 and the 'White Knight', Keith Aero Windermere who is a royal prince but as an illegitimate child of the king has no right to the throne, returns home to Windermere. His younger brother, Heinz, the heir to the throne is the "wind singer" and his voice can cause havoc to the enemy. Everyone in Windermere is preparing for war and everything will depend on the relationships of the two brothers and the people around them! The long-awaited manga providing the background story of the airborne knights who take part in "Macross Delta"! (The story takes place 9 years prior to the events of Macros Delta.)

name: The Bad Ending of an Otome Game
tags: Reincarnation,Long Strip,Romance,Reverse Harem,Video Games,Isekai,Drama,Fantasy,Villainess,Web Comic,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell:
The game's heroine had a limited time to live. Meanwhile, I played the role of the villainous friend that vies for the male leads' attention before being eliminated by the player. However, after that kid died, I made the decison on my own to exit from this story.
But, what do I do? The reactions of those around me are a bit strange.
"I came to the marquess’s estate because Ophelia needed a friend around her age. And now, Ophelia's dead."
Their gaze seemed to be asking me why I was stating the obvious.
I said it plainly.
"So, I should leave now."
For some reason, the two men made an expression as if they were at a loss for words.
They used to consider me a fly that stuck to Ophelia's side, so why?
*Otome Game: A game targeted towards women where the protagonist (player) is female

name: Born as the Villainess’ Daughter
nutshell: I was born as the villainess's daughter inside a novel. When I was born, Mom's wrongdoings have already been revealed leading to her confinement in the tower, and soon she'll receive a miserable death at the hands of the main characters. I held her hand while looking over my mother who searched for her ex-husband until her dying breath. My small hand entwined Mom's rough one and she finally turned to me with a warm gaze. "I understand you, Mom." "..." "Don't struggle anymore, and rest well." And don't wait for something like Dad who won't come. At my words, a tear fell from my mother's eye and soon, she comfortably rested. As the novel's villainess is dead, I, her daughter, will also die tomorrow night by those people. And then the second part of the novel will start. A novel where the main characters go on adventures, love and become happy at the first part. But I don't want to die and I have no thoughts of letting the second part flow as it is. "It's fine even if I'm this mean." It's a life where I don't know when I'd die anyway, so might as well change how the novel's second part goes.

name: I Have Max Level Luck
nutshell:
<End of The World> A Virtual Reality game praised for its extreme difficulty.
Hansung was once a top-tier ranker, but he got trapped inside the game!
It’s hard to survive with his current stats. However, Hansung has a high level of luck!
Obtaining SSS class skills from random boxes? That’s easy!
Hitting the jackpot from the slot machine? A piece of cake!
He is overflowing with luck!
So, can Hansung safely clear this game by only relying on his luck?

name: Castle Swimmer
nutshell: What happens when your entire life is ruled by a prophecy – your future foretold by people you’ve never met, who died long before you were born. Such is the story of two young sea creatures. One believed to be a guiding light for his people, a Beacon who will lead them to a bright, prosperous future. The other is a teenage prince for who’s destiny is to KILL the Beacon so that HIS own people might thrive. When both reject the course set for them, it leads to a raucous adventure as big and unpredictable as the ocean itself – and a romance that nobody could have predicted.

name: The Demon Lord's Love Life Isn't Going Well
nutshell:
Entering high school, Fujimura Kotone dreams of making friends and finding love. However, her classmates avoid her because of her scary demeanor. One day, a group made up of two girls and a boy come into her class and kneel before her, proclaiming, "It's an honor to meet you, Demon Lord!". With their antics, will she be able to obtain the normal love life she desires?
A reincarnation romantic comedy that transcends space and time!

name: Fullmetal Alchemist - Digital Steel Remake: Armstrong Muscle Siblings (Doujinshi)
nutshell: FMA fanbook, dedicated (mostly) to the Armstrong siblings: Alexander, Olivier and fan-favourite Catherine all make an appearance here.

name: 3CM Hunter
nutshell:
While out to get his sister’s favorite snack, Baekhyeon finds himself and the people around him suddenly shrinking... to the size of ants! Now, everything from cats to robotic vacuums pose a threat to human survival. Within this chaos, everyone is given a gift -- a unique superpower and interface that lets them see data about themselves. Though it’s become a dark and desperate world, Baekhyeon must put his ability and wits to the test to make it out alive and save his sister.



Official Simplified Chinese Translation


Official Spanish <Es> Translation


Official Indonesian Translation


Official Japanese Translation

name: Shokkan Harassment
nutshell: Yajima, a project lead in the design department, is swamped with work by Mita, his newly arrived boss from hell. Every day, he doesn’t even have enough time to eat a meal! When he becomes unable to endure his empty stomach and starts having snacks at his desk, Mita orders that snacking during work hours is prohibited! Yajima takes offence at this unreasonable order, but by accident, learns that Mita has a strange sexual fetish that means he gets aroused… by seeing people eat?!

name: Social Outcast
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,School Life,Web Comic,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell: Song Yuanxun, an indifferent homophobe, matched with Fang Zhaomu, whom he hates, on a dating app! Unexpectedly, he found out that Fang Zhaomu is clingier than he thought…

name: Shingeki no Kyojin - The monster cries, “it’s scary, it’s scary.” (doujinshi)
I Don't Mind Being Second Girlfriend
nutshell:
Kirishima and Hayasaka are two classmates who have a secret relationship in the public eye.
In their school life they act as if they do not know each other, but secretly, there is much more than people can imagine. Both of them get into a relationship that becomes difficult to break and ends up being impure, unhealthy and complicated since the relationship between them was nothing more than a fling that simply generated a love triangle before Kirishima’s first love and second love.

Links:

Official LN (JP)

name: A Manga About a Village of Super-Ultra-Ultimately Cute Elves Burning Down
nutshell:
In which a village of super-ultra-ultimately cute elves burns down.
From the mangaka of Do Chokkyuu Kareshi x Kanojo.

name: Day in the Life of the Shinomiyas
Tokyo '80s
nutshell: It's the story of a trip from a teens league of friends in Tokyo of the 80's till today, mirroring their paths and relationships.

name: Something Happening
nutshell: Chihiro was just dumped by his girlfriend, so his senpai organizes a drinking party to cheer him up.

name: Opening My Eyes, I Was a Princess
nutshell:
KR: ||
콩가루 왕가의 막내딸로 다시 태어났다!?
막둥이 공주의 콩가루 왕실 찰떡 만들기 프로젝트!
“네 혼처가 정해졌다. 제국 황제.”
막 태어난 자기 딸에게 무슨 소리야?!
가족에겐 관심 0! 워커홀릭 국왕 아빠.
나 홀로 로맨티스트 사치 만렙 엄마.
자신감 대출 급구!! 오늘도 고독하신 첫째 오빠
마이 라이프 이즈 마이 룰! 유아독존 둘째 오빠.
심지어…… 미래의 남편은 할아버지?!
"그래. 내가 여기서 살아남으려면 딸바보, 동생바보로 만들어야 해!"
||
